channel.title: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
channel.description:
Hello...
Im currently usin bluurrs client for my server..
And i was wondering how do i make it so every1 can see sprites.. Also on my server only people with the player rights of 3 can only see there OWN custom sprites because i changed something in client.java in my server fiels
This is the code i changed in my server files so people can see there own sprites [code]
// mod/admin level crown fix -bakatool if(playerRights == 3) out.write(5); else out.write(playerRights);[/code]
As you can see if you change the number 5 to a differnt number for e.g 7 people with the player rights of 3 can see there own sprites.. and it would be the donator sign. But other players cant see the donator sign it would just be a normal admin sign to other players. Can you please tell me how can i make it so everyone can see the custom sprites and not only the person who has the player rights of 3
Note:I changed the sprites before people downloaded Note: Im usin deltascape source
Help is much appreciated
I hope you understand...
Thanks PLEASE HELP

item.title: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello…

Im currently usin bluurrs client for my server…

And i was wondering how do i make it so every1 can see sprites…
Also on my server only people with the player rights of 3 can only see there OWN custom sprites because i changed something in client.java in my server fiels

This is the code i changed in my server files so people can see there own sprites

[code]

			// mod/admin level crown fix -bakatool
			if(playerRights == 3)
				out.write(5);
			else
				out.write(playerRights);[/code]

As you can see if you change the number 5 to a differnt number for e.g 7 people with the player rights of 3 can see there own sprites… and it would be the donator sign.
But other players cant see the donator sign it would just be a normal admin sign to other players.
Can you please tell me how can i make it so everyone can see the custom sprites and not only the person who has the player rights of 3

Note:I changed the sprites before people downloaded
Note: Im usin deltascape source

Help is much appreciated

I hope you understand…

Thanks
PLEASE HELP

Read full topic
item.source: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
